courses.who_for: Illinois new drivers aged 18–20 without a high school driver ed course.
requirements: Must be taken before obtaining Illinois driver’s license

submission.certificate: Adult Driver Education Certificate of Completion must be presented at SOS facility
submission.reporting: Some providers report electronically, but physical certificate often required
submission.deadlines: Complete before applying for license; certificate valid ~2 years

court_vs_insurance.court: Not used for ticket dismissal; separate traffic school exists.
court_vs_insurance.insurance: Not mandated, but insurers may offer discounts.
